lead_paragraph: The cult member, Bruce Davis, was convicted of the 1969 killings of the musician Gary Hinman and the stuntman Donald Shea.

headline.print_headline: Manson Follower Denied Parole Again in California
headline.main: Manson Follower Denied Parole Again in California

snippet: The cult member, Bruce Davis, was convicted of the 1969 killings of the musician Gary Hinman and the stuntman Donald Shea.
abstract: Gov Jerry Brown of California denies former Charles Manson follower Bruce Davis parole for third time; Davis was convicted of 1969 murders of Gary Hinman and Donald Shea, but was not involved in killings of actress Sharon Tate and six others.
